content: add a burst of color and comfort to your crochet collection with the **emotional support bouquet shawl pattern** this eye-catching shawl features a soft textured body and a border of lively crocheted flowers and leaves perfect for adding a personal uplifting touch to any outfit the pattern is designed with all skill levels in mind clear step-by-step instructions guide you through every stage from starting the base to adding each cheerful flower easily adjust size and flower placement to match your style **pattern details ** * written printable pdf instructions * materials list and stitch abbreviations provided * links to helpful video tutorials * customizable sizing color and flower arrangement level beginner-friendly with detailed tips **language** english us crochet terms this is a digital crochet pattern not the finished item crochet a shawl that hugs you back and lights up your day download the emotional support bouquet shawl pattern and start your own floral-inspired project today ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/4keyn9i ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/4mgbayp ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/32_9nybm64m ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/5wva0rjsizw
